entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
